description:
An all-in-one collection for all your card game needs! 
Make way for the definitive playing card collection, with ten classic games!

Enjoy Six Competitive Games With Multiplayer!
Test your might against players from all over with online matches, or bring Nintendo Switchâ„¢ consoles together for a local showdown. The choice is yours! If you'd prefer to play alone, the computer AI is more than willing to oblige!

Challenges and Rewards!
Complete a variety of achievements, unlocking new game backgrounds and music tracks, or test your mettle in challenge mode, where you'll have to take on an assortment of puzzling trials!

-Included Games

Solitaire Games:
Klondike, FreeCell, Spider Solitaire, Couple

Competitive Games:
Daifugo, Hearts, Sevens, Page One, Texas Hold 'em, Blackjack

*For multiplayer mode, each participant will need a Nintendo Switch and a copy of this game.
name: THE CARD Perfect Collection
